programme.title: Dear Elizabeth
programme.desc: Sid Straw is an office worker whose life takes a massive tumble when he tries to get in touch with an old classmate, who also happens to be international star Elizabeth Banks. programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.sub-title: Action, Drama, History, War, Documentary And Factual ║ 2001 ║ 15
programme.desc: War drama based on real events, starring Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor and Tom Sizemore. On 3 October 1993, elite US troops were sent into Somalia's capital, Mogadishu, to capture two lieutenants working for the local warlord responsible for orchestrating a famine in the region. programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers, a successful nightclub manager and local celebrity, embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion in 1985, but things soon get a little strange. Moving up a carriage to the buffet car lands him in 1995, where he finds his clubs have failed and his life has fallen apart. Tony discovers that by moving up and down this fateful train, he can transport himself forward and backward to various stages of his life. Not only that, but the actions he takes in one carriage directly affect his life in the next. Paul becomes close with Fremen warrior Chani and begins to demonstrate powers that persuade her people to aid in the young man's plan to avenge his father and take back control Denis Villeneuve - Director Timothée Chalamet - Paul Atreides Zendaya - Chani Austin Butler - Feyd-Rautha Harkonnen Florence Pugh - Princess Irulan Corrino Rebecca Ferguson - Lady Jessica Atreides Javier Bardem - Stilgar Léa Seydoux - Lady Margot Christopher Walken - Emperor Shaddam IV Josh Brolin - Gurney Halleck Stellan Skarsgård - Baron Vladimir Harkonnen Charlotte Rampling - Reverend Mother Mohiam Dave Bautista - Glossu Rabban Harkonnen Anya Taylor-Joy - Alia Atreides Timothée Chalamet - Paul Atreides Zendaya - Chani Austin Butler - Feyd-Rautha Harkonnen Florence Pugh - Princess Irulan Corrino Rebecca Ferguson - Lady Jessica Atreides Javier Bardem - Stilgar Léa Seydoux - Lady Margot Christopher Walken - Emperor Shaddam IV Josh Brolin - Gurney Halleck Stellan Skarsgård - Baron Vladimir Harkonnen Charlotte Rampling - Reverend Mother Mohiam Dave Bautista - Glossu Rabban Harkonnen Anya Taylor-Joy - Alia Atreides.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Children's, Family, Mystery, Drama ║ 2016 ║ PG
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure directed by Steven Spielberg, starring Mark Rylance and Ruby Barnhill. London, 1983: ten-year-old Sophie is awake in the middle of the night when she spots a giant from the window of her orphanage home. Although Sophie hides, the 24ft behemoth grabs her and takes the little girl to Giant Country. There she learns he's actually vegetarian and extremely ancient, but he's also as unloved as she is Steven Spielberg - Director Mark Rylance - The BFG Ruby Barnhill - Sophie Penelope Wilton - The Queen Jemaine Clement - Fleshlumpeater Rebecca Hall - Mary Rafe Spall - Mr Tibbs Bill Hader - Bloodbottler Adam Godley - Manhugger Olafur Darri Olafsson - Maidmasher Paul Moniz de Sa - Meatdripper Jonathan Holmes - Childchewer Mark Rylance - The BFG Ruby Barnhill - Sophie Penelope Wilton - The Queen Jemaine Clement - Fleshlumpeater Rebecca Hall - Mary Rafe Spall - Mr Tibbs Bill Hader - Bloodbottler Adam Godley - Manhugger Olafur Darri Olafsson - Maidmasher Paul Moniz de Sa - Meatdripper Jonathan Holmes - Childchewer.

programme.desc: Partners in crime Jai and Veeru set their next target on a rich businessman, Rai Bahadur. Things turn hilarious when both of them fall for his daughters.

programme.title: Happy Hardy And Heer
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Happy loves Heer, but she considers him to be just a good friend. When Heer moves to London and falls in love with Hardy, Happy vows to do everything possible to win her heart.

programme.title: Woh Bhi Din The
programme.desc: In Jamshedpur, Rahul finds himself tangled in a love triangle, making his friendships and choices way more complicated than he ever expected. Drama, romance, and tough decisions await!

programme.title: Fukrey Returns
programme.desc: Fresh out of jail, a vengeful don plots her comeback, targeting the four friends who double-crossed her. Revenge is sweet, and she's ready to serve it!

programme.title: Gupt
programme.desc: In India, Sahil clashes with his father, Jaisingh, over marriage choices. After a tragic argument leads to Jaisingh's death, Sahil is imprisoned but plots his daring escape.

programme.title: Shor
programme.desc: A devoted father lives solely to hear his son speak, but when his dream comes true, he unexpectedly loses his hearing, creating a bittersweet twist in their bond.

programme.title: Piya Ka Ghar
programme.desc: Malti marries Ram who according to the priest is a wealthy man. But when she goes to his house, she realises that he is very poor.

programme.title: Khandaan
programme.desc: In a struggling Indian village, the Srivastav family faces turmoil as sons Vikas & Ravi navigate love, crime, & tragedy, leading to surprising revelations and choices that change their lives forever.

programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: Vivek, a troublesome hacker, wreaks havoc on girls' devices, costing Sameera her job. In a twist, Sameera murders him, but his hacking unexpectedly helps her escape justice.

programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: (Movies @6) Join four friends in a hilarious race against time as they scramble to keep a stash of stolen cash all to themselves. Friendship, chaos, and laughs ensue in this wild adventure!

programme.title: Sooryavanshi

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Fulham v QPR
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, promotion-chasing Fulham host QPR at Craven Cottage in a west London derby that saw a memorable comeback.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Middlesbrough v Wolves
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Middlesbrough host Wolves at the Riverside in 2018 in a game that saw the visitors reduced to nine men.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: C'Ship 15/16
programme.desc: The most lucrative fixture in world football - the Sky Bet Championship play-off final - sees Hull City and Sheffield Wednesday meet at Wembley Stadium for a place in the Premier League.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: League 1 15/16
programme.desc: Barnsley meet Millwall at Wembley Stadium in the Sky Bet League 1 play-off final. Both clubs were in the Championship together as recently as 2013-14.

programme.title: EFL Play-Off Final: League 2 15/16
programme.desc: AFC Wimbledon meet Plymouth Argyle at Wembley in the Sky Bet League 2 play-off final. While Argyle are looking to return to League 1, Wimbledon are seeking a place there for the first time.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Cardiff v Wolves
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Cardiff City host Wolves at the Cardiff City Stadium in 2018 in a match that had a dramatic ending.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Derby County v Cardiff
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County take on Cardiff City at Pride Park in the 2017-18 campaign in a match with implications in the play-off race.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Derby County v Leeds
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Derby County take on Marcelo Bielsa's Leeds United at Pride Park in a Championship match that saw five goals.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: West Brom v Leeds Utd
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, West Brom take on Leeds United at The Hawthorns in a high-scoring Championship match that saw one side dominate.

programme.title: EFL Cup Retro 17: Man Utd v S'ton
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic League Cup final from years gone by, as Manchester United and Southampton meet in the 2016-17 campaign in a game packed with goals and drama.

programme.title: Retro C'Ship 10:Cardiff v L'cester
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Championship play-off semi-final from 2010, as Cardiff City take on Leicester City at the Cardiff City Stadium in a thrilling game that would go to the wire.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: A. Villa v Birmingham
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Aston Villa host Birmingham City at Villa Park in a high-scoring Second City derby.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Aston Villa v N. Forest
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Aston Villa host Nottingham Forest at Villa Park in an enthralling, end-to-end encounter that saw 10 goals.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Leeds Utd
programme.desc: In the dying embers of an 2018-19 Sky Bet Championship clash at Villa Park, Kemar Roofe's last-gasp goal sealed a famous Leeds comeback having trailed 2-0 to Aston Villa.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Aston Villa v Sheff Utd
programme.desc: In 2019 at Villa Park, Tyrone Mings, Tammy Abraham and Andre Green saved Villa's blushes, scoring three goals in the final 10 minutes to steal a point from the visiting Sheffield United.

programme.title: EFL 18/19:Leeds Utd v Derby County
programme.desc: Frank Lampard's Derby go to Elland Road for the second leg of their 2018-19 Sky Bet Championship play-off semi-final with Marcelo Bielsa's Leeds, with the odds stacked against them.

programme.title: EFL 18/19: Charlton v Doncaster
programme.desc: Two matches of Sky Bet League 1 semi-final play-off action couldn't separate Charlton Athletic and Doncaster Rovers in 2019, as a date at Wembley hinged on a dramatic penalty shootout.
